column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: 10 to 15 Chinese nationals attacked 3 of their countrymen causing serious injuries at 4:20 am July 20
column5: outside Discovery Hotel along Road 214/63.------The men were beaten with batons
column6: with one being knocked unconscious.------Police did not
column8: attend the scene. Two of the injured went inside the hotel and the man with head wounds was taken to hospital. The attackers left the scene. ------TDNews
